original_text: So he departed thence, and found Elisha the son of Shaphat, who was plowing with twelve yoke of oxen before him, and he with the twelfth: and Elijah passed by him, and cast his mantle upon him.
korean_text: 엘리야가 거기서 떠나 사밧의 아들 엘리사를 만나니 그가 열두 겨릿소를 앞세우고 밭을 가는데 자기는 열두째 겨릿소와 함께 있더라 엘리야가 그리로 건너가서 겉옷을 그의 위에 던졌더니

sentences.original_text: and found Elisha the son of Shaphat,
who was plowing with twelve yoke of oxen before him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 앞에서 열두 겨리 소로 밭을 갈고 있었고,
그는 열두 번째 겨리와 함께 있었다:

sentences.original_text: and cast his mantle upon him.
